ygData.subject: Re: Armor
ygData.msgSnippet: BlackBurrow Paw - works best in a group.  You should be able to find a group to join if you go in solo.  But even solo if you do it right should be good. Then
ygData.messageBody:
BlackBurrow Paw - works best in a group. You should be able to find a group
to join if you go in solo. But even solo if you do it right should be good.
Then there are good spots not too far inside besides the heavily camped
ones. The gnolls drop lots of small weps that sell for pretty decent loot.


Snyak

-----Original Message-----
From: Patricia Halas [mailto:patty_halas@...]
Sent: Wednesday, May 19, 1999 9:30 AM
To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
Subject: [warriors_eq] Armor

From: "Patricia Halas" <patty_halas@...>

I am a brave warrior of the 12th Rank. Although I have a
fine steel long
sword, I can't seem to get enough loot to buy any decent
armor. I am in
east commons now headed back to Halas and I only have 10
plat in the bank.
Help! Where should I be hunting to get loot!

p.s. On top of that, I know once I get decent armor it will
weigh me down.
What is avalible at higher ranks to increase my strength
(currently a paltry
130)?

For the Honor and Glory of Rellos Zek;

Patty of Halas
username: Patricia
server: Bristlebane
